name: Cel Per
text: First time going, it was OK for me, but my kids loved it!

name: Kathy Cook
text: Went here last night, nice place. Way to many tables, with very little games. Minor complaints, you don't have an option to use debit credit  get your tokens at the token dispenser like chuck e cheese, and for so many tables they don't have â€¦More

name: Santiago Pinales
text: Love the pizza here! Had my son's birthday party here and the hostess was very attentive to our needs. I enjoy going here more than Chuck E Cheese. It doesn't feel cluttered up.

name: Kate Patrick
text: Went to a 4 year old birthday party today. The space was clean, the food was prompt and they were well organized. Very well done and easy on the budget.

name: Corrin Ronquillo
text:
Gave an extra star only because my young kids love the place.
The salad bar is OK, has your normal veggies; lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, cheese, bacon...the salad dressings are basic; itailian, ranch... â€¦More

name: J Chavana
text: I come here with my kids ,every other weekend. Its not crowded,good pizza,my kids love it.plus there's beer I love it. Everybody happy.not like the rat place.

name: S S
text: I love this Peter Piper Pizza location. The staff is friendly and the facility is always clean. I know the manager takes pride in her place because it shows. Peter Piper Pizza is my favorite pizza place.

name: Amanda Gutierrez
text: The area is so small. And literally only 15 games you can play for .50 cents each. Only bright side, there was no one else there. No waiting! Oh and where's the cheese on the pizza?!

name: Aryan Khalili
text: Customer service was good, manager friendly and offered to make my favorite pizza. ( thin crust double pep) however most pizza's lacks any taste. Pizza's were all dry My throat is itching while I am writing this.Best crappy pizza in northwest.

name: Tareq Salman
text: Love this place. Took my son on the weekend as a reward for getting honor roll in his school . He loved it  he even said I like this place more than chuck e cheese .pizza is great .come here Mon-fri 11am-2pm for pizza buffet

name: Patrick Knapp
text: Cleaner version of the rat with better seating (better lit, cleaner and more room). Same concept, same bad pizza that my children love. However, I can have wings and a beer while they unwind.

name: Porter Stubblefield II
text: Northwest Houston area new facility which we checked out with our 6 year old son during spring break 2014. Pros: The store was new, so it was clean. Lots of seating, abundant salad bar. Cons: Pizza had little flavor, bland at best. â€¦More

name: Emanuelle Lopez
text: I used to love going to PPP in Los Angeles, so I was disappointed to find such a different place here. Definitely small, but also awful pizza. They have a.nice selection of games, and the eating area is well kept, but it's just not as good as I remember it.

name: Michelle Phillips
text: Pizza was really good best cheese bread sticks I've ever had. Customer service was great they had alot of table space but use it all they were packed with parties and they made them feel special.  It was awsome my kids loved it. Great place great staff

name: Jared Weis
text: We had our 8 year old son's birthday party here and were very pleased. The girl assigned to assist us was very helpfull and cheerfull. Prices for a birthday party are very resonable compared to similar business models such as Chuck E Cheese and the atmosphere is better. Games for older kids and not near as congested.

name: A. Jackson
text: The pizza is like frozen pizza that you can make at home. It get two stars for keeping the little people entertained and one star for beer!!!

name: Melissa Stedorro
text: Dining area huge so not crowded and loud. Any place I can take the boys and they have a blast is great with me. And very clean. Pizza not so great, wings average but we go for the activities not the food.

name: Jose Chavez
text: I love cheese pizza and they gave me tomato pizza litteraly i posted a picture. The place is huge but too many tables and about 15 arcade games. never coming back. â€¦More

name: Anh Tran
text: Great pizza!!! Chicken wings could of been crispier but i still love this place..

name: Xavier Ascencion
text: I just loved the arcades I got a whoopie cushion hahahahahahahahahahahahahahaha

name: Carlos Beth Moreno
text: Terrible customer service. Mediocre food. Overpriced games. Was very disappointed today as we were excited to visit this new place in the Copperfield area. I do not recommend.

name: Lorena Lambridia
text: Horrible pizza!! Tomatoe sauce taste so nasty! Do not recommend!

name: William Gray
text: really good pizza and the arcade is on point

name: Gwyn Taylor
text: Well I like this place in SA didn't realize we had one here in the Houston area, gonna check it out

name: Miriam Gonzalez
text: So awesome and has lots of games

name: Sirron Reed
text: 3 words food is YUMMY!!!!!ðŸ˜©ðŸ˜©ðŸ˜©

name: L Winters
text: Went by today and unfortunately it has closed it's doors. A sign on the door stated that the wallisville and Pasadena locations are still open.

name: Brandi DePaula
text: Staff was incredible

name: Olivia L. Espinosa Flores
text: Love it

name: Olivia Quijano
text: I never been to Peter Piper Pizza, before since I was a Child but I love that, place!!! :-) :-) :-) :-) :-)

name: domonone13
text: It's ok

name: Samia Youssef
text: Dlicious pizza with newyork option

name: Steven Torres
text: I love. It

name: Francisco Quijano
text: (Translated by Google) Very few games. Too many birthdays at a time. Very short time for celebrations â€¦More
